ants

Class AntFoodSpawn

  • java.lang.Object
    • ants.AntGameObject
      • ants.AntFoodSpawn

  • public class AntFoodSpawn
extends AntGameObject
    This class represents a game object that generates food on the map that can be harvested by ants. A food unit can be held by an ant and brought back to the ant's hill to give birth to a new ant.
    Author:
    Benjamin

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean food
      Whether food is available on the spawn.
      private int lastHarvestRound
      The last time food was harvested from the food spawn.
      private org.json.JSONArray replayData
      The replay data of the food currently present in the spawn.

      • food

        private boolean food
        Whether food is available on the spawn.

      • lastHarvestRound

        private int lastHarvestRound
        The last time food was harvested from the food spawn.

      • replayData

        private org.json.JSONArray replayData
        The replay data of the food currently present in the spawn. [ row, col, pop_round, gth_round, bot_id ]
        See Also:
        Documentation/protocol/replayformat.html

    • Constructor Detail

      • AntFoodSpawn

        public AntFoodSpawn(AntGameMapCallback moveHandler,
                    int col,
                    int row)
        Creates a new food spawn from a column and row identifier.
        Parameters:
        moveHandler - the handler used to move the food spawn on the game map.
        col - the initial column identifier of the food spawn.
        row - the initial row identifier of the food spawn.

      • AntFoodSpawn

        public AntFoodSpawn(AntGameMapCallback moveHandler,
                    Cell cell)
        Creates a new food spawn from a cell descriptor.
        Parameters:
        moveHandler - the handler used to move the food spawn on the game map.
        cell - the cell descriptor that positions the food spawn on the map.

    • Method Detail

      • createFood

        public void createFood(int round)
        Creates food on the food spawn.
        Parameters:
        round - the game round at which the food is spawned.

      • harvestFood

        public void harvestFood(int botId,
                        int round)
        Harvests food on the food spawn.
        Parameters:
        botId - the identifier of the bot that harvested the food unit.
        round - the game round at which the food is harvested.

      • cleanFood

        public void cleanFood(int round)
        Makes the food on the food spawn disappear (at the end of the game essentially).
        Parameters:
        round - the game round at which the food is cleaned.

      • toJSONArray

        public org.json.JSONArray toJSONArray()
        Gets a JSON representation of a food unit.
        Overrides:
        toJSONArray in class AntGameObject
        Returns:
        [ "F", row, col ] when food is present.
        See Also:
        Documentation/protocol/gamestate.html

      • hasFood

        public boolean hasFood()
        Returns whether a food unit is present on the food spawn.
        Returns:
        true if food there is food on the spawn, false otherwise.

      • getLastHarvestRound

        public int getLastHarvestRound()
        Gets the last time a food unit was harvested on this spawn.
        Returns:
        the last time food was harvested.

      • getReplayData

        public org.json.JSONArray getReplayData()
        Gets the replay data for the food unit currently present in the spawn.
        Returns:
        the replay data of the food unit.
